chatting.letSend: Send private photos and messages to a friend or group.

report.nudityDetailContent:
Photos, videos and some digitally-created content that show sexual intercourse, genitals, and close-ups of fully-nude buttocks.
Intimate images of others that were shared without permission.
Some photos of female nipples, but videos of post-mastectomy scarring and women actively breastfeeding are allowed.
Nudity in photos of paintings and sculptures is OK.
There are times when we may remove videos that show nude or partially-nude children.
report.violenceDetailContent:
Photos or videos of extreme graphic violence.
Posts that encourage violence or attacks on anyone based on their religious, ethnic or sexual background.
Specific threats of physical harm, theft, vandalism or financial harm.
report.suicideDetailContent:
Posts encouraging or promoting self-injury, which includes suicide and cutting.
Comments identifying victims of self-injury if the post attacks or makes fun of them.
report.terrorismDetailContent:
Photos or videos of hate speech or symbols.
Posts with captions that encourage violence or attack anyone based on who they are.
Specific threats of physical harm, theft or vandalism.
report.spamDetailContent:
Photos or videos relate to spam, Posts with
Post contain the content relate to spam
report.thankYou: Thank you for letting me know
